name.en: Electronic database of legal entities and branches (Krygyzstan)

description.en: The Ministry of Justice of the Republic of Kyrgyz maintains the register of legal entities.

access.onlineAccessDetails:
Company can be searched by its name ('наименование'), registration number ('Рег. №'), tax number ('ИНН'), OKPO code ('Код ОКПО', assigned to each legal entity for statistics purposes), company status ('Статус'), registration date ('Дата') etc.  

Search is free-of-charge, no English interface.
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: Registration number is the 'Рег. №' which should be used as the identifier
